author: The Telegraph
title: Save 20% on a Steam Engine Footplate Experience Course with Elsecar Railway
text: The Telegraph has teamed up with Elsecar Heritage Railway to offer readers the opportunity to take control of one of their full size heritage industrial steam railway engines, at an exclusive discounted price of Â£111 per person. All steam engines have two crew members; the driver and the fireman. During the one hour course you will experience the excitement of driving and firing a steam engine along the one mile length of their line. Their challenging 1 in 37 gradient is an unforgettable highlight as you tackle a hill start and keep steam up. With the smell of steam and hot oil, the heat from the fire and the sound and power of the engine, plus their welcoming crew; a fantastic experience on the footplate is guaranteed at Elsecar Heritage Railway. Guests are welcome to watch and take photographs too. Courses are run on Saturdays, Sundays and Mondays. How to book To book, email courses@elsecarrailway.co.uk , quoting promotion code EHRTELEGRAPH2015 . *Promotional course places are subject to availability and the course must be taken by 31 October 2015. @telegraph
